computerGraphics.title: Rasterizer
description: Implemented a rasterizer that converts Scalable Vector Graphic (SVG) files into pixeled images.
Tested various methods of pixel sampling for texture mapping.

computerGraphics.title: Mesh Edit
description: Simulated the physics of cloth by creating a mesh of springs and point masses.
Used verlet integration and other formulas to compute new positions.

computerGraphics.title: Pathtracer
description: Produced renderings of 3D environments using ray intersections and bounding volume hierarchies.
Added support for direct and global illumination using Monte Carlo Path Tracing.

computerGraphics.title: Pathtracer 2
description: Simulated mirror and glass materials in a 3D environment using ray refraction/reflection.
Completed a thin-lens model capable of depth refocusing using ray intersections.

computerGraphics.title: Cloth Simulator
description: Simulated the physics of cloth by constructing a mesh of spring and point mass data structures.
Applied texture and displacement mapping using vertex and fragment shaders in GLSL.

computerGraphics.title: Cel Shading
description: Produced and applied cel-shading to 3D models using Unity’s built-in shader API.
Animated 3D models using blend trees and programmed basic combat system.

computerVision.title: Colorizing the Prokudin-Gorskii Photo Collection
description: Aligned colored-separated images using coarse-to-fine image pyramids.
Computed L2 norm over rescaled images as a metric for alignment.

computerVision.title: Fun with Filters And Frequencies
description: Formed hybrid images by combining the low pass and high pass filters of images.
Completed a multi-resolution blending algorithm using Gaussian and Laplacian stacks.

computerVision.title: Face Morphing
description: Applied Delaunay triangulation to render meshes over faces for defining key correspondences.
Animated face morphs and caricatures through linear interpolation of vertices and pixels.

computerVision.title: Auto-Stitching Photo Mosaics
description: Stitched images together by defining correspondences and computing the homography matrix.
Implemented auto-stitching using Harris Corner Detection and RANSAC.

computerVision.title: Facial Keypoint Detection with Neural Networks
description: Designed a convolutional neural network capable of detecting facial keypoints for images using PyTorch.
Optimized model by iteratively adjusting hyperparameters based on the training vs. validation loss.

computerVision.title: Poor Man's Augmented Reality
description: Developed a simple form of augmented reality by using OpenCV’s built-in trackers.
Inserted a synthetic object into the scene by computing the camera projection matrix for every frame.

computerVision.title: Light Field Camera
description: Simulated the effects of light field cameras by shifting and averaging rectified images.
Implemented interactive depth refocusing using Gaussian pyramid image alignment.

webDevelopment.title: Voltz
description: Completed a transportation-converter that displays the time and distances for different modes of transport.
Functionality created using JavaScript and webpage was stylized using CSS and Bootstrap.

webDevelopment.title: StoryScape
description: Designed and developed a web app that uses ChatGPT and Dall-E to generate children stories.
Implemented OpenAI API calls and assisted with prompt engineering.

myGames.title: Ghost of Viridia
description: Assassinate the people you once called heroes and uncover the hidden truth of Viridia's past.

myGames.title: Totally Not Doom
description: A tech demo for 3D cel-shading in Unity

myGames.title: Bear's Bobaria
description: Welcome to your boba shop! Mix and match a variety of tea, ingredients, and toppings to create delicious drinks.

otherGames.title: [ME][TA]L
description: [ME][TA]L is a rhythm game revolving around, you guessed it, metal! But it's not like your average rhythm game, so be careful. >:)

otherGames.title: Don't Wake Up
description: A horror game where you help a girl wake up from her nightmares.

otherGames.title: Slime Attack
description: 2D Platformer where you play as a slime

otherGames.title: Polydrome
description: You act as a brave polygon, trying to protect your edges from being robbed by the zombie polygons - zolygons.
